column2:
"I think I say this for everyone,
but I sincerely thank you for your
assistance."
"1. It was the proper thing to do"
"2. What were those things?"

"I agree with <%me>,
for us ARKS, this is only natural."

"I'm rather curious though,
regarding that Devil Castle
and the Buster Tower."
"I was worried about that earlier. About that Buster Tower too."

"Starting with the Devil Castle.
It was summoning enemies, was
that some kind of fortress, or
something else...?"

"You could say that it's both. It
spawns Demons indefinitely, as well
as capable of independent thought.
This is all part of the Devil Castle."

"It's brought forth into this world by
a Summoning Spell. It's a vile entity
that is forced upon this world."
"Summoning Spell?"

"Magic that is used to pull vile beasts
from another world."
"This world flows with Magic."

"The Mana that flows throughout the
atmosphere causes our technology to
induce a supernatural event."

"Hmm, this sounds familiar to what we
call Photons and Techniques."

"This is likely why we're able to
analyze the Buster Tower and the
Devil Castle so quickly; They share
a common trait."

"There is a limit, however, to how
much Mana one person is able to
handle. Because of which, a
standardized range was estabilished."

"Though, this all changed
when \"Ephimera\" appeared..."

"Several decades ago, Ephimera started
to spread all over the world. It had
blossomed without ever dropping
a seed."

"Thus it was found to be very useful
as a catalyst for Magic."

"One nation specializes magic that
augments their strength, another
nation uses magic for medicinal
techniques, and another uses it for
the arcane art of proliferation."

"And our nation created
Summoning Magic."

"The Devil Castle is at the top of Summoning
Magic. It will root itself into this world
by consuming all of the Ephimera growing around it."

"It'll summon barriers to surround itself
and summon Demons to attack, while utilizing
powerful attacks of its own."

"No matter what Magic is used,
it is near impossible to break
through its walls."

"Once summoned, it will be impossible to summon
another Devil Castle due to the lack of Mana
and Ephimera used to summon the first one."
"Then a side wins once someone summons a Devil Castle."

"Correct. War... has changed,
all thanks to the appearance
of these Devil Castles."

"Thus, the \"Buster Towers\" were
created to defeat this vile
Summoning Magic."

"So that was what we used
during that battle."

"It's a siege weapon that uses
the Mana in the atmosphere,
to destroy the Devil Barriers."

"However, it requires vast amounts of Mana to
even use and control them. Without using Ephimera,
it's impossible for us to control."

"But <%me> was able to
handle it with ease and defeat the
Devil Castle."

"Mana for Magic, its technology
is a lot of effort... To use its
power, compensation is needed."

"There's no way to use so much power
without a price..."

"The countless feuds between
each nation, the coup d'etat
in my own nation... It's all
thanks to the power of Ephimera."

"This infernal flower, its fiendish
nectar is what drives this world
insane. Our goal is to rid this world
of it, to return this nation...
Rather, the world, back to normal."

"World peace is rather grandiose...
But I can't really say much."

"Harriet, would you mind letting
<%me> hold that flower?"

"Focus your strength on that flower,
like you would with Photons."
"Just as I expected..."
"As expected..."
"Eh, Harriet, what do you mean...?"

"It's part of the tale I was about to
explain before. An ancient legend
that has been passed down since
ancient times."
"It goes something like this."

"Even if the world is in despair, you must
not grieve. From beyond the light, a distant
land; A guardian will appear, guided by a spirit."

"The guardian, delivers us, the path of light.
The light becomes a focus for the brave and
help to guide their comrades."

"They will guide their people towards the
correct path of salvation to the light. "

"Do not be afraid, as they will guide us
towards salvation. A savior will come,
and vanquish the darkness and spread the light."

"<%me>, a visitor from a
distant land as foretold
by legend..."
"No, \"Guardian.\""

"Please, I beg you, lend us your
strength."

"Such a large and amazing story all
of a sudden..."
"Are you ok with this, Harriet?"

"I understand that this is from
folklore, but it's evident that
we're not of this world. Wouldn't
it be unwise to have faith in such people?"

"Of course, I would be on alert
if this were a mere fairytale."

"But you lent me your strength,
and you've saved me twice."

"With that alone, you have
earned my faith."

"Despite not knowing the rights and
wrongs of this world, you have aided
us without hesitation. For that,
I'll continue to trust in you."

"Even without the legend, I would
have acted the same."

"That flower that they call Ephimera,
it reacted to the Photons and
disappeared."

"It was the embodiment of the Darker
element. As ARKS, we cannot ignore
this. Besides..."

"Since you've told us this much,
we're obligated to help no matter
what! Right...?"
"I thank you so much!"

"We've obtained a bunch of intel.
How about we head back to the ARKS
Ship and report our findings?"
"The Savior"
"The Existence of Salvation"
